LanguageData.AteRawFoodTough.stages.0.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.AteRawFoodTough.stages.0.description: I had to eat raw food. Desperate times, desperate measures.
LanguageData.AteCorpseTough.stages.0.label: ate corpse
LanguageData.AteCorpseTough.stages.0.description: I had to eat a corpse without even butchering or cooking it. It was needed to survive.
I ate a meal cooked from gray, slimy insect meat. It's an aqquired taste.
LanguageData.AteInsectMeatDirectTough.stages.0.label: ate insect meat
LanguageData.AteInsectMeatDirectTough.stages.0.descri: I ate some gray, slimy insect meat. Unpleasent but filling.
